use-tagify-comment: Use Tagify to display tags | default: true
use-submit-comment: Use submit button to process input instead of automatic behavior while typing (only works with defined submitButton) | default: false
openthesaurus-comment: Add call to openthesaurus API to enrich words (experimental) | default: false
waittime-comment: Set time to wait for processing after keyboard input | default: 1000

categories.assign-top-comment: true -> return top tag (category) of found keyword; false -> return the keyword itself | default: true
categories.include-top-comment: Include top tag (category) as a keyword | default: false
